title: Titan Potion
summaries: The Titan Potion is a buff potion which grants the Titan buff when consumed, increasing the amount of knockback enemies will take by 50% when attacked by the player. This lasts for (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 8 minutes / (Old-gen console version) 4 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon using Cycle Next/Previous Buff and then pressing Remove Buff ([img:Console version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Old-gen console version]), or by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]).
